item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The theme is awesome - easy to see that from the preview. The support you get once buying the theme is second to none. Great support & awesome service.
item.content:encoded: The theme is awesome – easy to see that from the preview. The support you get once buying the theme is second to none. Great support & awesome service.
